title: Social Media Hashtag Hunter
description: Find hashtags used in social media posts. They start with # and contain letters, numbers, or underscores.
solutionSummary: This pattern matches hashtags starting with # followed by one or more letters, numbers, or underscores. The ^ and $ anchors ensure the entire string is a valid hashtag, and [a-zA-Z0-9_]+ matches the allowed characters.
